Noch die entlegensten Ausdrücke fürs Unanständige, derem Kenntnis keine Schule, kein Elternhaus, keine literarische Erfahrung vermittelt, versteht man, nachtwandelnd wie in der...

Verstand(ige)

To reach rational knowledge by our intelligence is the just demand of the mind which comes to science. For intelligence, understanding (Verstand), is thinking, pure activity of the self in general; and what is intelligible (Verständige) is something from the first familiar and common to the scientific and unscientific mind...
